about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Alaska is a representative of a special type of ship, standing somewhere between a cruiser and a battleship. She was officially classified as a battlecruiser.
She resides at Tier IX in the game. The ship has large dimensions, boasts an extensive pool of HP, carries powerful 305 mm artillery, and is equipped with a diverse set of consumables. Alaska excels at destroying cruisers at mid-range distances.

Tier IX Alaska B is a stand-alone Premium ship. The only difference in comparison to her standard counterpart—Tier IX Alaska—is the color scheme of her permanent camouflage.

Key features:

  • In terms of artillery armament, the ship carries guns similar to those of a battleship—nine 305 mm main guns placed in three turrets. In comparison to other cruisers, she features excellent armor-penetrating capabilities and has high chances of setting the enemy on fire with HE shells, but her downside is a slow reload time of 20 seconds. Her maximum firing range is 19 km, but the ship demonstrates her best combat performance at distances of 10–15 km
  • This cruiser comes with a remarkable 60,800 hit points—high for this ship type
  • In battle, the ship can make use of the following consumables located in four slots: Damage Control Party in slot 1; Defensive AA Fire or Hydroacoustic Search in slot 2; Surveillance Radar, Spotting Aircraft, or Fighter in slot 3; and Repair Party in slot 4
  • She earns more credits per battle, and her camouflage adds a 50% XP bonus per battle and reduces the cost of your ship's post-battle service by 10%

Contents of this bundle:

  • Tier IX Alaska B
  • Port slot


If you already have this ship in your Port, you will receive 16,150 doubloons as compensation.
detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Alaska is a representative of a special type of ship, standing somewhere between a cruiser and a battleship. She was officially classified as a battlecruiser.

Tier IX Alaska B is a stand-alone Premium ship. The only difference in comparison to her standard counterpart—Tier IX Alaska—is the color scheme of her permanent camouflage.

Key features:

In comparison to other cruisers, she features excellent armor-penetrating capabilities and has high chances of setting the enemy on fire with HE shells, but her downside is a slow reload time of 20 seconds. Her maximum firing range is 19 km, but the ship demonstrates her best combat performance at distances of 10–15 km

  • In battle, the ship can make use of the following consumables located in four slots: Damage Control Party in slot 1; Defensive AA Fire or Hydroacoustic Search in slot 2; Surveillance Radar, Spotting Aircraft, or Fighter in slot 3; and Repair Party in slot 4

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will receive 16,150 doubloons as compensation.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 51 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 53 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

name: World of Warships — Black Alaska Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 51 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 53 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")

short_description: An American cruiser with a fancy black exterior!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*
*languages with full audio support
